Located in Panama City Florida and Dothan Alabama

best possible service found in the RV business today from all lof our
departments:
RV Sales
,

,

and

extensive inventory

About RV Connections
Family Owned & Operated Florida RV Dealer
Family Owned & Operated Florida RV Dealer We are Northwest Florida's
highest volume RV dealership!
RV Connections was founded in 1999 by industry veteran Jack Stewart and
wife Kay. In 2003, the dealership was expanded to a second 7-acre location
in Panama City, Florida, which includes our Parts and Accessories Store
and Service Center. Since then, six more acres have been purchased,
bringing our total to more than 13 acres. In September of 2017, we expanded
to our second location in Dothan, Alabama. We now have two locations to
serve you!
RV Connections History
Though our business has grown rapidly over the years, our goal is still
the same as it was when we began - 100% customer satisfaction.
We know it's our customers that make us a success, and we promise to
deliver the best possible service you'll find in the RV business today -
before and after the sale. We pride ourselves in our unparalleled customer
service.
Expert Staff
Our knowledgeable and friendly sales staff is always here to assist you,
and our factory-trained service technicians will deliver the most
dependable service in the industry.
Unmatched Inventory
We carry a large selection of America's leading brands of fifth wheels,
motorhomes, toy haulers, and travel trailers.
With our unbeatable prices and extensive inventory, you're sure to find an
RV to meet your needs and your budget. Check out our inventory today.
Come and visit us and see why RV Connections is Northwest Florida's
highest volume RV dealership! We look forward to meeting you! If you have
any questions, please contact us.
Snowbirds Love Us Too!
Flying south for the winter? RV Connections is #1 among Florida RV
Dealers!
Whether you are a Florida local and looking for a great RV to buy, need a
trusted location to service your RV, or just visiting the Florida
panhandle and needing to upgrade your RV, RV Connections is your one-stop
Florida shop for motorhomes, travel trailers, fifth wheels, toy haulers
and RV parts.
We are your convenient Florida and South Alabama RV Dealer, located in
Panama City, Florida and also in Dothan, Alabama.

RV Connections Team
Our expert staff is always ready to help you with anything.
You can
contact RV Connections
any
time during normal business hours and a specialist or team member will
get back to you!
You can also contact a team member directly with the information below
or use our online contact form to the right.
Our team members look forward to helping you!
